title: Los Angeles Heritage Awards Gala
desc: The 2015 Los Angeles Heritage Awards  is one of the most highly anticipated events in Los Angeles. Join us, as we pay tribute to this year?s distinguished honorees - AC Martin Partners and the AC Martin Family   for their incredible contributions to the economic and cultural growth of the City of Los Angeles.     Wednesday, December 9, 2015  5:30 P.M. Reception followed by Dinner and Awards Presentation.  ?   Honoring  A.C. Martin Partners and the A.C. Martin Family  ?  Dorothy Chandler Pavilion, Grand Hall  135 N Grand Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90012  ?   Benefiting  Project Restore, a non-profit organization which works to preserve and protect city of LA historic buildings, monuments and public spaces that define our communities? rich cultural heritage. Our successes are due to the continued support from our public-private partners.? With your renewed commitment, we?will continue to advance our historic restoration efforts which impact the communities that define us. ?
